credit_line: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
title: Textile samples
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: discontinuous supplementary weft (brocade) on plain weave georgette
description: Four samples, two with white and two with black ground. Design brocaded in gold and silver. Deep border of pendant scrolling stems with large-scale roses. Both selvedges present on all samples.
name: Textile samples
